sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ThemeService } from '../theme.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.scss'] }) export class HomeComponent { currentTheme: string; constructor(private themeService: ThemeService){} ngOnInit(): void { this.themeService.currentTheme$.subscribe(theme => { this.currentTheme = theme; // Perform any necessary actions based on the updated theme }); } }

Anas Malvat

Hi 👋, I’m Abdur, an MSc in Applied Computing student at the University of Toronto. I’m passionate about Backend, Cloud and DevOps, and I’m also an AWS Certified Solutions Architect. Along with my grad studies, I’ve been working as a DevOps Intern at 16Bit.ai, a MedTech startup based in Toronto 🇨🇦. Before joining the MScAC program, I worked as a Backend Engineer at BuyerAssist.io, a B2B SaaS startup based in India 🇮🇳. When I’m free, I make YouTube 🎬 videos on career, higher education & productivity
